name: AdventureClub
0:
”Alexa, ask Adventure Club to start the adventure”
”Alexa, ask Adventure Club to play”
”Alexa, ask Adventure Club to begin playing the adventure”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: adventure club
des:
Adventure Club is a fun way to learn about concepts from across scientific fields, starting with space! On your first adventure, join Andrea and John as they use their knowledge and space ship to travel our solar system! 

Have fun learning about our world and the cosmos with Adventure Club!

Narration & Writing Credits: Andrea Chen
Sound Credits: Timbre (Simulation of NASA (rocket) launch), Speedenza (Found In Space - 19), mmasonghi (Cinematic Deep Bass Rumble)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
